alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 9:51PM MST until December 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow showers becoming much less widespread by Midnight MST. New snow accumulations between 1 and 2 inches. * WHERE...Areas near Prescott, Prescott Valley, Seligman and Valle. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Slippery and snow covered roads could led to very difficult travel. Patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility at times above 6000 feet. Additional snow forecast from 9 PM Today to 11 PM Today: Prescott 0 to 1 inches Prescott Valley 0 to 1 inches Seligman 0 to 1 inches Valle 0 to 1 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
